sentences.en: Black smog reduced visibility to about fifty yards.
sentences.cn: 黑色的烟雾使能见度降到大约五十码左右.

sentences.en: The pilot homed in by means of radar, despite the poor visibility.
sentences.cn: 尽管能见度极差,飞机由雷达导航返航了.

sentences.en: The plight of the Kurds gained global visibility.
sentences.cn: 库尔德人的苦难引起了全球关注。

sentences.en: The road was realigned to improve visibility.
sentences.cn: 道路作了调整，视野清晰了。

sentences.en: The saddles feature a reflective trim for night time visibility.
sentences.cn: 这些车座的特点是带有在夜间可视的反光镶边。

sentences.en: The sand in the air reduced visibility to a hundred yards.
sentences.cn: 空中的沙尘将能见距离降低到100码.

sentences.en: The weather was at its worst; bitterly cold, with leaden skies that gave minimum visibility.
sentences.cn: 天气极其恶劣。寒风凛冽，天色晦暗，能见度极低。

sentences.en: Under the glare of the street lamps, visibility was good.
sentences.cn: 在街灯的照射下, 可以看得很清楚.

sentences.en: Visibility at the city's airport came down to zero, bringing air traffic to a standstill.
sentences.cn: 该市机场的能见度降为零，空中交通陷入了停顿。

sentences.en: Visibility on the roads is down to 20 metres due to heavy fog.
sentences.cn: 道路能见度因浓雾降至20米。

sentences.en: Wire frames and bounding boxes solve problems of object visibility.
sentences.cn: 线框和边框解决了对象的可视化问题.

sentences.en: Yet Kissinger succeeded in defying an old Washington dictum that you can have in the capital visibility or influence, but not both.
sentences.cn: 在华盛顿有一条传统格言:要么抛头露面,要么得势弄权, 二者不可兼得. 基辛格却公然蔑视这种传统.

words.tran_cn: 明显的；看得见的；现有的；可得到的
可见物；进出口贸易中的有形项目
视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力

phrases.tran_cn: 不良能见度；能见度不良；较差能见度

trans.tran_cn: 能见度，可见性，可见距离，清晰度
trans.tran_en: the distance it is possible to see, especially when this is affected by weather conditions
